thoughts.text: The 'duolingo' package has been reinstalled successfully. We can now use the 'execute_shell' command to check if the package is installed correctly by running the 'pip list' command. We can also modify the Python script we created earlier to include our Duolingo username and the language we want to learn. Then, we can use the 'execute_python_file' command to run the modified script. We could also use the 'write_to_file' command to save our language learning progress to a file for future reference.
